column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was excited to be going to Cancun in two weeks .
#text=I brought my tickets a few months before , and when the day arrived , I simply printed out the ticket from my computer .
#text=I brought my two suitcases filled with clothes and necessities , along with my visa and other important travel documents .
#text=Once I got to the airport , I passed by security and they checked my bags for anything that was illegal or dangerous .
#text=Once I got past the checkpoint , I waited at a terminal for an hour .
#text=They began to call for my plane and I got on line .
#text=I gave the lady my visa and ticket and I boarded the airplane .
#text=I put the luggage above my head in the luggage department and sat down .
#text=My seat was next to a window so I was very happy about that .
#text=Soon a person sat down next to me .
#text=We were told to eventually put our seat belts on as we were ready to fly .
#text=We watched a short video on what to do in case we felt some turbulence and what to do in case of emergency .
#text=Then the airplane lifted off and I was scared at first , I felt some shaking but eventually we were in the air and everything was okay .
